mapper.update: update users set u_password=#{uPassword},u_email=#{uEmail},u_phone=#{uPhone}, u_addr_postcode=#{uAddrPostcode},u_address=#{uAddress}, u_address_sub=#{uAddressSub},u_nickname=#{uNickname}, u_updated_at=sysdate where u_id=#{uId}
mapper.select: select a.order_id,a.user_id, a.product_id,to_char(a.created_at,'YYYY-MM-DD') created_at ,b.p_name,b.p_direct,b.p_b_price,b.p_sale_type,c.order_status,d.i_sub_img,e.u_name from orders a join(select product_id,p_name,p_direct,p_b_price,p_sale_type from products) b on a.product_id = b.product_id join(select order_status_id,order_status from order_status) c on a.order_status_id = c.order_status_id join(select product_id,i_sub_img from product_images) d on a.product_id = d.product_id join(select user_id,u_name from users) e on a.user_id = e.user_id where a.user_id = #{param1}

select p.product_id, p.p_name, p.p_direct,p.p_b_price , to_char(p.p_created_at,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') p_created_at ,p.p_sales_status,p.p_sale_type,a.i_sub_img from products p join (select product_id, i_sub_img from product_images) a on a.product_id=p.product_id where p.user_id = #{param1}

select a.wishlist_id,a.product_id,a.user_id,p.p_name, p.p_direct,p.p_b_price,p.p_sale_type,p.p_sales_status, i.i_sub_img,u.u_nickname from wishlists a
join (select product_id,p_name,p_direct,p_b_price, p_sale_type,p_sales_status from products) p on p.product_id = a.product_id
join (select product_id, i_sub_img from product_images) i on a.product_id = i.product_id
join (select user_id, u_nickname from users) u on u.user_id = a.user_id
where a.user_id = #{param1}

select b.auction_id, b.product_id, p.p_name, u.user_id, u.u_nickname, p.p_dur, b.bids_at, b.amount, p.p_b_price, p.p_sales_status, i.i_sub_img from bids b join products p on p.product_id = b.product_id join users u on u.user_id = b.user_id join product_images i on i.product_id = b.product_id where user_id = #{param1}
